cam_high: The video is captured from a camera mounted above the robot workspace, providing a top-down view of the bimanual robot and table.
cam_left_wrist: The video is captured from a camera mounted on the left robot arm wrist, showing the left gripper's perspective.
cam_right_wrist: The video is captured from a camera mounted on the right robot arm wrist, showing the right gripper's perspective.
cam_waist_left: The video is captured from a camera on the left side of the robot base, showing the left side of the workspace.
cam_waist_right: The video is captured from a camera on the right side of the robot base, showing the right side of the workspace.
